constraints.name: prefix_suffix_length
constraints.description: 字符串的最长前缀同时也是后缀的长度，称为该字符串的 level。
constraints.formal: level(s) = max { |p| : p is a prefix of s and p is also a suffix of s }

constraints.name: transmissibility_sum
constraints.description: 字符串的 transmissibility 定义为所有子串的 level 之和。
constraints.formal: transmissibility(s) = Σ level(s[i:j]) for all 0 ≤ i ≤ j < |s|
